reasons_to_visit.details: September offers ideal temperatures with comfortable days and cool evenings, perfect for mountain hiking on Ještěd.
Early fall foliage starts appearing on Ještěd Mountain and around Harcov reservoir, creating beautiful hiking and photography opportunities.
Local harvest season begins with special events and traditional Czech celebrations in Old Town Square.
Tourist numbers decrease significantly while weather remains excellent at major attractions like Ještěd Tower and Liberec Zoo.
September marks the return of serious cultural programming at the Regional Gallery and Liberec Castle after summer break.

reasons_to_avoid.details: Daylight hours begin decreasing, affecting late evening activity timing and mountain access.
September can bring more frequent rain showers requiring weather preparation, especially for mountain activities.
Weather changes may affect cable car access to Ještěd Tower and mountain hiking safety.

activities: Cable car rides to Ještěd Tower
